text: 6.20 Wkp 16.2-3, 16.12-15, Sng 110.4, Hib 3.1, 5.6, 5.10, 7.17, 8.1, 9.24 Jisas nɨm, ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep Melkisedek ak tek mɨdɨl, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak pel pelnep yenɨgab. Ne God agnɨgep kal awl ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ ned amɨl, chɨnop nen wog gɨñɨlɨg God ayɨp mɨdeb.6.20 Ñɨn nokom olap sap yeb ne kuŋay yɨbɨl, Yislel bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak ne wog awl olap golɨgup. Chag meme bulmakaw pakɨl, nɨkɨm ak dɨl, God nop sɨbog ñolɨgup. Tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, nop sɨbog ñolɨgup. Nɨkɨm dad, God agnɨgep kal awl kaw ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ amolɨgup. Kaw ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ anɨb ak, God ne ke yolɨgup. Buk Wok Pris sapta 16 ayɨp, buk Hiblu sapta 9.1-7 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨm. Pen mɨñɨl Jisas ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak mɨdɨl, God agnɨgep kal awl God man ne alaŋ mɨdeb ak, kaw ñɨluk mɨgan ayaŋ amub. Mɨgan ayaŋ mɨdɨl, binɨb okok gach kɨlop mɨdupsek tɨg walɨg gɨyokeb. Buk Hiblu sapta 2.17 ayɨp, sapta 4.14 ayɨp, sapta 8.2 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨmɨn.
